verbs.description: [ARG1: russian hammer thrower] [V: banned] [ARG2: for using 4 different drugs a russian hammer thrower] has been banned for doping after testing positive for a cocktail of four different drugs the russian track and field federation says tatyana kachegina sample contained the anabolic steroids turinabol and stanozolol as well as the heart drug meldonium and ghrp-2 which prompts the body to make more growth hormone she has been banned for four years the federation says bans were also handed to four other russian athletes three were for positive doping tests and one for failing to give a sample tatyana kachegina growth hormone moscow iaaf stanozolol international association of athletics federations
